DOC.brief_summary: Absorption, distribution, metabolism, and excretion (ADME) study with 14C in healthy young men.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating MOA-728 Administered in Healthy Men
DOC.criteria: Men aged 18 to 50 years inclusive at screening. Body mass index (BMI) in the range of 18.0 to 30.0 kg/m2 and body weight â‰¥50 kg. BMI is calculated by taking the subject's weight, in kilograms, divided by the square of the subject's height, in meters, at screening: BMI = weight (kg)/[height (m)]2 Healthy as determined by the investigator on the basis of screening evaluations. Nonsmoker or smoker of fewer than 10 cigarettes per day as determined by history. Must be able to abstain from smoking during the inpatient stay.
